nodes.documentation: Document Key shadow retrieval service contract.
nodes.name: SecretStoreDocumentKeyShadowRetrievalService

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not owner of the given public key."

arguments.value: Caller is not owner of the given public key.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not owner of the given public key."

nodes.documentation: / Only pass when caller is the owner of given public key.
nodes.name: onlyPublicOwner

nodes.documentation: When document key common-portion retrieval request is received.
nodes.name: DocumentKeyCommonRetrievalRequested

nodes.documentation: When document key personal-portion retrieval request is received.
nodes.name: DocumentKeyPersonalRetrievalRequested

nodes.documentation:
When document key common portion is retrieved. Ater this event s fired, wait for
 exactly `threshold+1` `DocumentKeyPersonalRetrieved` events with the same `decryptedSecret` value.
nodes.name: DocumentKeyCommonRetrieved

nodes.documentation:
When document key personal portion is retrieved. After enough events are fired, use `secretstore_shadowDecrypt`
 to decrypt document contents.
nodes.name: DocumentKeyPersonalRetrieved

nodes.documentation: When error occurs during document key retrieval.
nodes.name: DocumentKeyShadowRetrievalError

nodes.documentation: Constructor.
We do not support direct payments.
Request document key retrieval.
nodes.name: retrieveDocumentKeyShadow

nodes.documentation: Called when common data is reported by key server.
